author: Rebecca Klar
title: Former Trump campaign aide asks to finish prison sentence at home, citing coronavirus
description: President Trump's former deputy campaign chairman Rick Gates is asking to serve the remainder of his 45-day jail sentence at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, according to a court filing. Gat...
